response.overview: Tiri (Lily Macfarlane) is an orphaned girl who attempts to emotionally connect with Ruck (Drew Cyburt), the hitman who saved her life. Tiri's desire for companionship leads to choices that put them in danger from the ever present, Fusa (Jonathan Williams) and Coral (Heidi Macfarlane). Ruck and Tiri are forced to choose between protecting their hearts or killing for family.
response.title: Gunruck Elegy Professional
